snippet.title: Open Alpha Release Demo: Sinking Inn
snippet.description:
Welcome to the Alpha Release Demo for Sinking Inn! Featuring a trailer for Sinking Inn, a Q&A with our team leads about the development process, and a short gameplay demo with lighthearted commentary from the developers. If you’re interested in getting involved with OA, this is a great way to see just what kind cool stuff you get to do!

DOWNLOAD THE GAME ON STEAM! or as a direct download from our website: https://openalphausc.weebly.com/spring2021.html
Learn more on our website: https://openalphausc.com
And sign up for our newsletter: https://bit.ly/openalphaupdates
Go check out our instagram: https://instagram.com/openalphausc

Description for Sinking Inn: A lonely boy on a hopeful quest navigates through a dark and dreary motel. Dive into its mysterious, eerie atmosphere and find your way through the motel's strange puzzles, as it becomes increasingly clear that reality is not as it seems...

Sinking Inn was made by the 3rd cohort of Open Alpha, a student-run organization from the University of Southern California, affiliated with USC Viterbi School of Engineering, USC School of Cinematic Arts, and USC Games.
